text: thumb|right|250px| Igloofest is a yearly music festival. It is held outside in Montreal, Canada at the Old Port of Montreal. It began in January 2007 with about 4,000 people attending. In 2012 about 70,000 people attended. == References == ==Other websites== * Igloofest 2013, Montreal; YouTube * Official website Category:Music festivals Category:2007 establishments in Canada
title: Igloofest
